item.title: Enhancing My Daughter's Mupibox Media Server with Cover Art
item.description: Enhancing My Daughter’s MuPiBox Media Server with Cover Art My daughter loves her MuPiBox media server, which is packed with her favorite audiobooks and music. Recently, I decided to enhance her experience by adding cover art to each album. It’s a small touch, but seeing the album covers makes her browsing more enjoyable and visually appealing. Here’s how I added cover.jpg files to her MuPiBox media server. Tools and Libraries Used To achieve this, I used Python along with some handy libraries:
